Package connect4

Class CompPlayer

java.lang.Object
connect4.Player
connect4.CompPlayer
public class CompPlayer
extends Player
Computer player that acts like a human player but with strategy algorithms rather than inputs.
Version:
May, 2025
Author:
alexj0523

  • Constructor Details

    • CompPlayer

      public CompPlayer​(char c)
      Constructor that initializes the computer player with the superclass's constructor and the given color. If the player does not change the level, it is level 5.
      Parameters:
      c - color of the computer player's chip

    • CompPlayer

      public CompPlayer​(char c, int lv)
      Constructor that initializes the computer player with the superclass's constructor and the given color and level
      Parameters:
      c - color of the computer player's chip
      lv - level of the computer player
